3.7 The DUIM-OLE-CONTROL module

<ocx-dispatch>

Open concrete class

Summary

Adds some functionality for use in DUIM OLE controls to <simple-dispatch> from the OLE-Automation library.

Superclasses

<simple-dispatch>

Library

duim-ole-control

Module

duim-ole-control

Description

Adds some functionality for use in DUIM OLE controls to <simple-dispatch> from the OLE-Automation library.

Note that subclasses need to be defined by define COM-interface instead of define class.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
